id.description: Unique identifier for the business unit.

displayName.description: The display name of the business unit.

name.description: Name details of the business unit.

referring.description: Referring information related to the name.

items.description: Items associated with the referring information.

websiteUrl.description: URL of the business unit's website.

country.description: Country where the business unit is located.

numberOfReviews.description: Counts of reviews received by the business unit.

usedForTrustScoreCalculation.description: Indicator showing if these reviews are used for trust score calculation.

score.description: Score details of the business unit.

trustScore.description: Trust score of the business unit.

stars.description: Star rating of the business unit.

badFit.description: Indicator showing if the business unit is considered a bad fit.
